column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Christina - Thank you for your 5-star review. We greatly appreciate your kind words
column2: especially since you're an elite Yelper; your opinions are quite valuable to us! Above all
column3: I'm glad we have been able to provide consistent quality in terms of food and service for your visits. Needless to say
column4: that is a challenge for any restaurant that has more than one outpost. Thanks again
column5: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
